mapper.insert: insert into process_def (process_name, process_key, process_xml, recipe_type, submit_uid, update_uid, status, create_time, update_time, process_definition_key) value (#{processName}, #{processKey}, #{processXml}, #{recipeType}, #{submitUid}, #{updateUid}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{processDefinitionKey})
mapper.select: select * from process_def where recipe_type = #{recipeType} and status = 1 order by update_time desc limit 1
mapper.update: update process_def set process_name = #{processName}, process_key = #{processKey}, process_xml = #{processXml}, recipe_type = #{recipeType}, submit_uid = #{submitUid}, update_uid = #{updateUid}, status = #{status}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, process_definition_key = #{processDefinitionKey}, where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, process_name, process_key, process_xml, recipe_type, submit_uid, update_uid, status, create_time, update_time, process_definition_key from process_def
